user.biography: Welcome to our ✨ MAGICAL WORLD  of natural and sustainable WOODEN TOYS 🌿and OPEN-ENDED PLAY. Get inspired...and tell us YOUR STORY! #grimmswoodentoys

node.text:
We asked Alexandra from @onedaybabyvideo to share her experience with GRIMM's Magnet Puzzles on travels.

node.text:
🌿
Listen to Elke reading „The Story of the Root Children“ by Sibylle Olfers 🌿🌼🐞🌱🌸🐝🌾🪲 For all lovers of the root children and especially for all those who don‘t know them yet ...
🌿
We grabbed the book, a blanket and some rainbow friends and explored the meadows just around the corner from Grimm's headquarters ...

node.text:
FOLLOW US … 🌿 Yesterday we grabbed one of our favorite books „The Story of the Root Children“ by Sibylle Olfers @florisbooks , a blanket and some 🌈 #grimmsrainbowfriends and explored the meadows just around the corner from GRIMM’s headquarters. 
🌿
Look around you, very close to the ground or above you … 🌿 there’s so much to explore and there’s so much beauty in the little things. 🌸
🌿
We gathered rocks and 🌼 flowers and other natural treasures for an invitation to read and play with the Root Children and with a little paint, the stones became little 🐞ladybugs and 🪲beetles.

node.text:
Discover our wide range of Stacking Towers in different sizes, shapes and colors: 🌿 While stacking, the eye-hand coordination is stimulated and fine motor skills are trained and this is just ONE way to play with this versatile open-ended toy:
🌈 The first attempts to stack start at a very young age. But the older the children get, the more possibilities to play with the Stacking Towers arise. 🌈 So never put these treasures to far away, because they are offering a wide range of LOOSE  PARTS  and many different shapes of BUILDING BLOCKS for any kind of small world play: 🌈 Platforms and little worlds for the Rainbow friends can be built and by adding balls when stacking the discs, a challenging BALANCING GAMES for calm hands is created. 
🌈 And last but not least never underestimate the clever way to store the single building blocks, simply by stacking all the pieces back on the dowels. Tidying up never has been easier ! 😉
⁠
⁠

node.text:
Did you know that we are manufacturing more than 150 different decorative figures, that are all lovingly painted by hand here #insidegrimms ♥️ 
Every single piece is #madewithlove and these little treasures are so much more than just a simple birthday decoration! They are a charming addition to seasonal table scenes and adorn every table decoration for special days - for every occasion there is the right figure 🌿 Just perfect to start your own family ritual 🌈⁠
⁠
#celebratingtheseasons #celebratingwithgrimms #grimmswoodentoys #grimmstoys #grimms #seasonaltable #familyrituals #seasonalfestivitystand #myseasonaltable #jahreszeitentisch

node.text:
We wish you a ✨MERRY  CHRISTMAS 💫and always an open eye for the magical moments in our lives!⁠
⭐⁠
A year full of uncertainties is coming to an end and we all have experienced many limitations, worries, sorrows and fears. We sincerely thank our whole GRIMM'S team who worked so hard this year and went many extra miles.⁠
But we have also experienced many beautiful moments together and we are all united by the joy of what we do and we want to share this joy with you today with this beautiful song, that ALI has been singing for all of us, right before leaving for our Christmas Holidays ⭐️ Because especially in these times it is all the more important to experience and share spontaneous joy, to keep hope alive and to see life for what it is: a gift.⁠
⭐⁠
Now it's time to rest and relax in order to recharge your batteries. Stay healthy and take care of each other ! #seeyounextyear⁠
⁠
#insidegrimms #grimmsfacesofchristmas #grimmswoodentoys #woodentoys #magicalmoments #merrychristmas #thankful #sustainabletoys #waldorfinspired

node.text:
🌈 Where can I buy GRIMM’s woodentoys?
🌈 Is there a list with authorized GRIMM’S dealers? 
🌈 Why is GRIMM’S always out of stock?

Marco answers these and other questions about the availability of GRIMM's woodentoys in our new video 🌿
We have a lot of great GRIMM’S dealers around the world ❤ There are over 1200 in 50 countries! Check out our video, if you want to know, how you can find dealers in your country.
If you want to be sure to buy an original GRIMM‘s product, we recommend to buy from our authorized dealers 🌿

node.text:
We invite you to listen to Elke who is reading the first pages of „Giesbert und der Gluckerbach“(in German), written and illustrated by the wonderful German author Daniela Drescher. Have a look inside the book with us!
In the background, you see our Giesbert #invitationtoplay with the lovely little ducks from @ostheimerwoodentoys and playsilk from @sarahssilks
Building play scenes is a wonderful way to reenact the adventures of the favourite books of your children.
👉🏻 So far Daniela’s new book „Giesbert und der Gluckerbach“ is only available in German (published by @verlagurachhaus), but her first "Griswald" book and many more children's books are available in several languages. Have a look at her website http://www.danieladrescher.de/en/ (English)⁠
#verlagurachhaus #grimmsinvitationtoread #invitationtoread #readtoyourkids #invitationtoreadandplay#openendedplay #openendedtoys #grimmswoodentoys  #imaginativeplay #naturaltoys #woodentoys #ecotoys #sustainabletoys #madeinEurope #madewithlove #waldorfinspired #montessori #childhoodunplugged #invitationtoplay #notjustforkids

node.text:
We take you on a little tour through the current assortment of our factory outlet in Hochdorf 🌈 #insidegrimms
If you are in the area, visit us in our “seconds” shop in Hochdorf at the foot of the Swabian Alb! In terms of sustainability, we are selling products with minor blemishes that are often all the more unique! 🌿

OPENED:
Monday to Friday  9:00 - 12:00  and Monday to Thursday 13.00 - 15.00

Closed on Friday afternoon 🌈🌿

➡️ Please note: We don’t ship these products and don’t have an online shop. This is neither a flagship store nor a classic factory outlet. Accordingly, the assortment varies in our "seconds" shop and has 
no claim to completeness.


#insideGrimms #openendedplay #openendedtoys #grimmswoodentoys #imaginativeplay 
#naturaltoys #woodentoys #ecotoys #sustainabletoys #madeinEurope #madewithlove 
#waldorfinspired #montessori #childhoodunplugged  #invitationtoplay #notjustforkids

node.text:
Hello AUGUST⁠ 🌿☀️⁠ Our Seasonal Festivity Stand for the next month is inspired by a wonderful day at the beach 🏖with a lot of sunshine☀️, happy faces, boat rides⛵️, sandcastles and magical summer moments ...⁠✨ how do you like it? ☺️ ⁠
⁠🌈
We will take a SHORT SUMMER BREAK on Social Media and will be back in two weeks with lots of new open-ended play inspiration⁠ 💫⁠
⁠See you in two weeks!⁠⁠
🌈
#celebratingtheseasons #celebratingwithgrimms #grimmswoodentoys #grimmstoys #grimms #seasonaltable #familyrituals #seasonalfestivitystand #myseasonaltable #jahreszeitentisch

node.text:
A van trip to Iceland 🌿
Enjoy this glimpse into @giuliegiordi ‘s family van life with their GRIMM‘S favorites 🌈 

#grimmsrainbowfriends #grimmswoodentoys #grimmsmobilehome #grimmspebbles #grimmsdwarfs #grimmsoutdoorplay

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by GRIMM‘S on July 28, 2021. May be an image of body of water.

node.text:
For many years, our rainbow friends were faithful TRAVEL 🧳 💫 COMPANIONS on our family vacations because they simply fit into any carry-on luggage and always provided welcome distraction even on the longest hikes.⁠
⁠🌿⁠
Swipe to see them discovering different places in Europe and maybe you will recognize one of the places.⁠ Or hop over to our Stories where we will tell you the places 😉⁠
⁠🌿⁠
Tell us if you recognize any of the places or what journey you would like to take the #grimmsrainbowfriends 🌈 on. ⁠⁠
⁠🌿⁠
#traveltoy #traveltoys #traveltoysforkids #openendedplay #openendedtoys #grimmswoodentoys  #imaginativeplay #naturaltoys #woodentoys #ecotoys #sustainabletoys #madeinEurope #madewithlove #waldorfinspired #montessori #childhoodunplugged #invitationtoplay #notjustforkids

node.text:
We asked Alexandra from @onedaybabyvideo to share her experience with GRIMM's MAGNET PUZZLES on travels 🧳🚗🚈🛫
#grimmsmagnetpuzzles

The puzzles contain small parts. Don‘t leave your child age 3 and under unattended.

@thenycvideographer #openendedplay #openendedtoys #grimmswoodentoys  #imaginativeplay #naturaltoys #woodentoys #ecotoys #sustainabletoys #madeinEurope #madewithlove #waldorfinspired #montessori #childhoodunplugged #invitationtoplay #notjustforkids

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by GRIMM‘S on July 23, 2021.

node.text:
10 GRIMM'S TOYS THAT FIT IN EVERY TRAVEL BAG⁠ 🧳🎒⁠
⁠⁠
🌈 We have put together 10 GRIMM's toys that are small and light and perfect to take with you in your backpack, in the car or when traveling by train or by plane.⁠
⁠⁠
🌈 What is your favourite toy to take with you on trips? Feel free to share your experience with the community in the comments⁠ ☺️⁠
⁠⁠
⁠🌈 GRIMM‘S travel selection (swipe ➡️):⁠
1. Rainbow Friends⁠⁠
2. Tangram incl. template booklet⁠⁠
3. Weather Cardboard Book⁠⁠
4. Mobile Home⁠⁠
5. Set of Bowls ⁠⁠
6. Wooden vehicles⁠⁠
7. Creative Set Square incl. template booklet⁠⁠
8. Small stackers ⁠⁠
9. Pebbles⁠⁠
10. Magnet Puzzles ⁠⁠
⁠⁠
#openendedplay #openendedtoys #grimmswoodentoys  #imaginativeplay #naturaltoys #woodentoys #ecotoys #sustainabletoys #madeinEurope #madewithlove #waldorfinspired #montessori #childhoodunplugged #invitationtoplay #notjustforkids #grimmsoutdoors

node.text:
10 GRIMM'S TOYS THAT FIT IN EVERY TRAVEL BAG⁠ 🧳🎒
⁠
🌈 We have put together 10 GRIMM's toys that are small and light and perfect to take with you in your backpack, in the car or when traveling by train or by plane.
⁠
🌈 What is your favourite toy to take with you on trips? Feel free to share your experience with the community in the comments⁠ ☺️⬇️
⁠
⁠🌈 GRIMM‘S travel selection:
1. Rainbow Friends⁠
2. Tangram incl. template booklet⁠
3. Weather Cardboard Book⁠
4. Mobile Home⁠
5. Set of Bowls ⁠
6. Wooden vehicles⁠
7. Creative Set Square incl. template booklet⁠
8. Small stackers ⁠
9. Pebbles⁠
10. Magnet Puzzles ⁠
⁠
#openendedplay #openendedtoys #grimmswoodentoys  #imaginativeplay #naturaltoys #woodentoys #ecotoys #sustainabletoys #madeinEurope #madewithlove #waldorfinspired #montessori #childhoodunplugged #invitationtoplay #notjustforkids #grimmsoutdoors

node.text:
GIVEAWAY CLOSED!!! 🎉🎉 THE WINNERS ARE 🎉🎉 1. @life_with_a_downie 2. @our_life_in_tinysquares 3. @evamaria_koechler 🎉🎉🎉🎉 
🔴🟠🟡 BALLS & BEADS GIVEAWAY⁠ 🟢🔵🟣⁠
⁠⁠
🌿 Both for the balls and for the beads applies: ⁠⁠
⁠⁠The smaller the hands the bigger the wooden balls⁠ and the bigger the hands get, the smaller the balls can be.⁠⁠
⁠⁠
🌿 That's why we are giving away 3 packages⁠⁠
1. Large Balls and Large Wooden Beads⁠⁠
2. Medium Balls and Medium Wooden Beads⁠⁠
3. Wooden Marbles and Small Wooden Beads⁠⁠
⁠⁠
🌿 HOW TO ENTER:⁠⁠
1. Follow us @grimmswoodentoys⁠⁠
2. Like this post⁠⁠
3. Tell us in the comments which package you would love to win 👇🏽⁠ (swipe through to see the packages)⁠⁠
⁠⁠
🌿 To give other GRIMM’s lovers the opportunity to win as well, feel free to share this post with your friends & family💛 in your stories or simply tag other GRIMM'S lovers in the comments.⁠⁠
⁠⁠
*Friday, July 23, at 10 am (CET) we will randomly draw THREE WINNERS. We will announce and tag the winners on top of this post and in our IG Story. Open to all public accounts and private accounts. Open to all countries we sell our products. Instagram is not involved.⠀⁠⁠⁠⁠
⁠⁠
#grimmswoodenballs #grimmswoodenbeads #openendedplay #openendedtoys #grimmswoodentoys  #imaginativeplay #naturaltoys #woodentoys #ecotoys #sustainabletoys #madeinEurope #madewithlove #waldorfinspired #montessori #childhoodunplugged #invitationtoplay #notjustforkids

node.text:
Did you know, that our wooden balls are perfect 🌿 B A L A N C I N G  G A M E S 🌿 for any age, when being combined with different other #openendedtoys (just SWIPE):⁠
⁠
🔴 1. wooden balls and wooden beads are definitely a magical fit ⁠
⁠
🟠 2. Wooden balls and stacking towers are also a perfect match⁠
⁠
🟡 3. And Wooden balls and our #grimmsrings are also a dreamteam⁠
⁠
🟢 4. Wooden Balls and our Thread Game Small Bobbins are also a wonderful combination⁠
⁠
🔵 We invite you to experience and challenge not only your children, but also yourself ! Because you know, the smaller the hand, the bigger the balls should be to start stacking … but the older and more experienced you are, the higher the stack can grow 🔴🟠🟡🟢🔵🟣 ✨💫⁠
⁠
We hope you enjoy and feel free to tell us your favorite stack by commenting below 🌿⁠
⁠
❤️ Give it try and and don’t forget to tag us by using our HASHTAG #grimmsballstack ❤️❤️❤️⁠
⁠
#grimmsbeadsstack⁠
#openendedplay #openendedtoys #grimmswoodentoys  #imaginativeplay #naturaltoys #woodentoys #ecotoys #sustainabletoys #madeinEurope #madewithlove #waldorfinspired #montessori #childhoodunplugged #invitationtoplay #notjustforkids#ballrun #marblerun #grimmsballrun #grimmsbeadstack

🟡 We invite you to experience and challenge not only your children, but also yourself ! 🟢Because you know, the smaller the hand, the bigger the balls should be to start stacking … but the older and more experienced you are, the higher the stack can grow. 🔵✨💫

🟣 Give it try and and don’t forget to tag us by using our HASHTAG #grimmsballstack ❤️❤️❤️

node.text:
Hands up if you love building ball runs, too ⁠🙌⁠⁠
⁠⁠
🔴🟠🟡 #grimmsballrun⁠ ⁠🟢🔵🟣⁠
⁠⁠
🌿 Get inspired by the many different ball runs from the #grimmscommunity ⁠⁠
The possibilities are endless, from simple ball runs to complex constructions. Moreover, it’s a great family activity in which family members of all ages can join⁠. 💫⁠
⁠⁠
🌿And as with the wooden beads, the same applies to the balls: ⁠The smaller the hands the bigger the wooden balls⁠ and the bigger the hands get, the smaller the balls can be.⁠⁠
⁠⁠
🌿 Head over to our story and our "Ball Run" highlight for more inspiration!⁠
⁠⁠
🌈 Thank you for sharing your ball runs!⁠⁠
1. @cornish_rainbow_mumma⁠⁠
2. @pagesofchildhood⁠⁠
3. @artwoodz.craft⁠⁠
4. @childhoodelevated⁠⁠
5. @xandmama⁠⁠
6. @our.fun.childhood⁠⁠
7. @mishellynelly⁠⁠
8. @playupnorth⁠⁠
9. @buildingwithrainbows⁠⁠
10. @childhoodelevated⁠⁠
⁠⁠
#openendedplay #openendedtoys #grimmswoodentoys  #imaginativeplay #naturaltoys #woodentoys #ecotoys #sustainabletoys #madeinEurope #madewithlove #waldorfinspired #montessori #childhoodunplugged #invitationtoplay #notjustforkids
